tasks.title: Sell TV on Facebook Marketplace
checklist: Check model number on back panel
Take photos: front, sides, back, model label, powered on
Write description including purchase year, condition, accessories
Research recent sold prices for same model
Post on Facebook Marketplace with pickup details

tasks.title: Sell soundbar and gaming accessories bundle
checklist: Test soundbar functionality and record demo
Gather all remotes and cables
Bundle controllers and accessories
Take group photo of all items
Set bundle discount price

tasks.title: Bundle cables for e-waste drop-off
checklist: Collect all unused cables and adapters
Check Toronto Waste Wizard for e-waste guidelines
Find nearest drop-off location and hours
Bundle similar cables together
Schedule drop-off trip

tasks.title: Donate books to Little Free Library
checklist: Sort books by condition (good vs recycling)
Post good books in local Facebook groups
Find nearest Little Free Library location
Drop off remaining books
Recycle damaged books on paper recycling day

tasks.title: Pack and move plants to new location
checklist: Water plants day before move
Wrap pots in newspaper or bubble wrap
Transport in boxes with air holes
Set up in new location immediately
Monitor for shock in first week

tasks.title: Dispose of broken decorative items
checklist: Wrap broken glass items safely
Check garbage pickup schedule
Bag items appropriately
Set out on collection day
